author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Bathroom sink water supply line tips…I’m using 3/8 inch drop ears for the shut-off valves. I fasten the first drop ear to my HoldRite telescoping bracket, ensure the bracket is level and fasten it to the studs. I check that the bracket is at the right depth before moving on. Btw, I’m using self-drilling screws to secure the drop ears to the bracket. For more written tutorials and step by step videos about bathroom renovations visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Bathroom Sink Water Supply Line Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
